title: Pokemon Diamond & Pearl: Dialga vs. Palkia vs. Darkrai
title_japanese: ポケットモンスター ダイヤモンド＆パール ディアルガVSパルキアVSダークライ
title_synonyms: Gekijouban Pocket Monsters Diamond and Pearl: Dialga vs. Palkia vs. Darkrai
synopsis: While touring Alamos Town—home of the Space-Time Tower—with the beautiful Alice, Ash and his friends discover that the town's special garden has been decimated! Baron Alberto, a dashing but arrogant fellow, immediately blames the destruction on Darkrai. As if it just overheard the accusation, Darkrai appears and confronts our heroes! Who is Darkrai? Is it a fiend... or a friend in disguise? And as a battle between Legendary Pokemon Dialga and Palkia rages directly above Alamos Town—and threatens to tear a hole in the space-time continuum—will Ash and his friends survive this showdown and learn Darkrai's true nature? (Source: DVD Cover [English Version])

Adaptation.name: Gekijouban Pocket Monsters Diamond & Pearl: Dialga vs. Palkia vs. Darkrai

opening_themes: "Together 2007 (Eiga Version)" by Fumie Akiyoshi"We Will Be Heroes" (English Version)
ending_themes: "Be with You: Itsumo Soba ni (Always by your side)" by Sarah Brightman
